verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*. From the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* to the \w coast|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Hethlon|strong="H2855"\w*, as one \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, \w Hazar-enan|strong="H2704"\w*, the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, to the \w coast|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*; for these are his \w sides|strong="H6285"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \add and\add* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*; \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion for\add* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.\f + \fr 48.1 \ft a portion: Heb. one portion\f*

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion for\add* \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* even unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion for\add* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion for\add* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion for\add* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* even unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion for\add* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion for\add* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

¶ And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, shall be the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* which ye shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add reeds in\add* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, and \add in\add* \w length|strong="H0753"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \add other\add* \w parts|strong="H2506"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*: and the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of it.

The \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* that ye shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add shall be\add* of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, and of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*.

And for them, \add even\add* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, shall be \add this\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w*; toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add in length\add*, and toward the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, and toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, and toward the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w length|strong="H0753"\w*: and the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.

\add It shall be\add* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that are \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*; which have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, which went not \w astray|strong="H8582"\w* when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, as the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* went \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*.\f + \fr 48.11 \ft It…: or, The sanctified portion shall be for the priests\f*\f + \fr 48.11 \ft charge: or, ward, or, ordinance\f*

And \add this\add* \w oblation|strong="H8642"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that is \w offered|strong="H8641"\w* shall be unto them a thing \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.

And over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add shall have\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*: all the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \add shall be\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And they shall not \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* of it, neither \w exchange|strong="H4171"\w*, nor \w alienate|strong="H5674"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for \add it is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, that are \w left|strong="H3498"\w* in the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, shall be a \w profane|strong="H2455"\w* \add place\add* for the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, for \w dwelling|strong="H4186"\w*, and for \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*: and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.

And these \add shall be\add* the \w measures|strong="H4060"\w* thereof; the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, and the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, and on the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, and the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, and toward the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, and toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, and toward the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

And the \w residue|strong="H3498"\w* in \w length|strong="H0753"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add portion shall be\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w*, and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*: and it shall be over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add portion;\add* and the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* thereof shall be for \w food|strong="H3899"\w* unto them that \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.
And they that \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* it out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

All the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* \add shall be\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* by \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*: ye shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* \w foursquare|strong="H7243"\w*, with the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

¶ And the \w residue|strong="H3498"\w* \add shall be\add* for the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w*, on the one side and on the other of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w*, and of the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, and \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* toward the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w portions|strong="H2506"\w* for the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w*: and it shall be the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w*; and the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add shall be\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.

Moreover from the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and from the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add being\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \add of that\add* which is the \w prince’s|strong="H5387"\w*, between the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, shall be for the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w*.

As for the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \add shall have\add* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion\add*.\f + \fr 48.23 \ft a portion: Heb. one portion\f*

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \add shall have\add* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion\add*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion\add*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion\add*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* unto the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \add portion\add*.

And by the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, at the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H8486"\w*, the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall be even from \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \add unto\add* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w strife|strong="H4808"\w* \add in\add* \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*, \add and\add* to the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* toward the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 48.28 \ft strife…: or, Meribah-kadesh\f*

This \add is\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which ye shall \w divide|strong="H5307"\w* by lot unto the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and these \add are\add* their \w portions|strong="H4256"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And these \add are\add* the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*.

And the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add shall be\add* after the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

And at the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*: and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

And at the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*: and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*.

At the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \add with\add* their \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*.

\add It was\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add measures:\add* and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* from \add that\add* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add*, The \nd LORD\nd* \add is\add* \w there|strong="H3074"\w*.\f + \fr 48.35 \ft The \+nd LORD\+nd*…: Heb. Jehovah-shammah\f*
